import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "../index.scss"; const AllRecepies = () => { const [recipes, setRecipes] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchRecipes = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:5000"); setRecipes(response.data); console.log(response.data); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }; fetchRecipes(); }, []); const deleteTodo = (name) => { const newRecepie = recipes.filter((res) => res.name !== name); setRecipes(newRecepie); }; return (
{recipes.map((recipe) => (
  • {console.log(recipe.imagURL)}

    {recipe.name}

    {recipe.instructions}

    Cooking Time: {recipe.cookingTime} minutes

    • ))} {/*
    <>

    Pizza

    25 Mins
    Serves: 5
    <>

    Pasta

    30 Mins
    Serves : 4
    <>

    Curry chicken

    45 Mins
    Serves : 4
    <>

    Stir-Fry

    40 Mins
    Serves : 3
    <>

    Roasted Chicken

    425 Mins
    Serves : 6
    <>

    Beef Stir Fry

    40 Mins
    Serves : 2
    */}
    ); }; export default AllRecepies;
